entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
